column3: ## Test Editor Groups Search Interactions
Go to the DOAJ editor groups search at /admin/editor_groups

column4: All available records are found, and the first page of results is shown
There are ten editor name keywords shown in the single facet on the left.

column3: Go through each sort option in the "sort by" pull-down
In each case, click the "sort by" button to reverse the direction of sort

column4: The current search results are ordered correctly according to the selected sort field and the selected sort direction

column3: Enter a search term in the search box

column4: All the results for the selected constraints are found, and the first page is shown
Your search text remains in the search box

column3: Go through each field constraint under the "search all" pull-down.  You may change your search text if no results are found, to demonstrate that each field works correctly

column4: If there are search results, the first page is displayed
If there are no search results, suitable "No results to display" text is displayed

column3: Clear your filter and change the page size, using the page-size pull-down

column4: The size of the page of results displays increases appropriately

column3: Click the "Next" button to go to the next page of results

column4: The next page of results is displayed
The "First" and "Prev" buttons are activated

column3: Click "Prev"

column4: You are navigated one page forward and then one page back in the results

column3: Click "First"

column4: You are taken to the first page of the results

column3: Click on an editor

column4: You are taken to the user's account page

column3: Click back on the browser
Click on an associate editor

column4: You are taken to the user's account page

column3: Click back on the browser
Click "Delete this group" under any chosen group

column4: Confirmation window pops up

column3: Click "Cancel"

column4: The confirmation pop up closes
The group is not deleted

column3: Click "Delete this group" again, and click "OK"

column4: A pop up confirms the operation has completed successfully
The group disappears from the search results

column3: Click "Edit this group" next to any chosen group

column4: A new browser window opens at the page to edit the group

column3: Close the new browser window
Click the black X button to clear all filters

column4: The interface returns to the initial state
